Name: Head of small sphinx
Description: The head of this small sphinx has broken off at the neck. The uraeus is badly damaged as is the right lappet of the royal head-dress or Nemes. The oblong face shows slightly rounded cheeks and eyes, a wide protruding nose and a very small mouth. The section between the jaw and the neck, only partly preserved on the left, is very thick.The preserved part of the left shoulder and the beginning of the flat tail of the head-dress head backwards, as is characteristic for a sphinx.
